pages.text: The fabricator is an advanced production machine that needs to be built as multiblock. To form the multiblock, the controller needs to be $(thing)right-clicked$() while you look at the controller and it is the right of the two bottom blocks. This defines the front direction of the machine.
To build a fabricator you need:$(br) $(li) 3x Housing $(li) 4x Glass $(li) 1x Controller $(br) Which means 8 housings need to be crafted in total.

pages.title: Preview Image
pages.text: A formed fabricator built in the world.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The fabricator has 4 input slots, 1 output slot and an $(l:machine_mechanics#upgrade)upgrade slot$(/l).$(br2)$(li)Input 1: the general input slot. $(li)Input 2: 'Wire' slot. $(li)Input 3: 'Powder' or 'Mechanical Parts' slot.  $(li)Input 4: 'Plate' slot.$(br2) The machine knows what to put where with $(thing)'Shift+Click'$() or through piping.
